text: Stephen Earl Wilhite (March 3, 1948 â€“ March 14, 2022) was an American computer scientist. He worked at CompuServe and was the engineering lead on the team that created the GIF image file format. He won a Webby Lifetime Achievement Award in 2013. He was born in West Chester Township, Ohio. Wilhite died of COVID-19 at a hospital in Cincinnati, Ohio, on March 14, 2022, eleven days after his 74th birthday. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American computer scientists Category:American inventors Category:Scientists from Cincinnati Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ohio
title: Steve Wilhite
